attributes.action: Force a General Election by a vote of no confidence by signing this petition
attributes.additional_details: The current Government consists of incompetence over the economy, the mishandling of the cost of living crisis, mishandling of the Covid-19 pandemic, negligence with the NHS, broken promises after broken promises and scandals after scandals. It is time the public were given a say on whether they want the current Government to continue or to start afresh with a General Election.
attributes.background: Force a General Election by using using this petition as a vote of no confidence in the Government. The current Government is riddled with economic incompetence, negligence with the NHS, broken promises and scandals. It is time the public were given a say to start afresh.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631901
